translations: v．流口水；垂涎；（因喜欢、羡慕等）流露出强烈的欲望。
· The baby drooled all over the toy.
婴儿在玩具上流了一地口水。

sentences.sentence: Fashion editors drooled over every item.
sentences.translation: 时尚编辑们忘情地观看了每样东西。

sentences.sentence: They all but drooled over it.
He drooled tobacco juice over his chin.
sentences.translation: 他任由烟草水滴淌到他的下巴。
